situation.title: Self-reporting
situation.meta_description: If the result of your test is positive, then the text message will also include the code. You use that to gain access to the self-reporting form.

content.processed:
Recommendations

If the result of your test is positive, then the text message will also include the code. You use that to gain access to the self-reporting form.

Completing this form will facilitate the work of trace call centres and speed up the flow of information. Self-reporting forms are processed preferentially by regional hygienic stations.

The contacts will be asked to quarantine and thus significantly prevent the further spread of COVID-19.

Please self-report. It will help reduce the spread of the disease. Thank you.
